scripts.deploy: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.update: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/upgrade.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:dev:mumbai: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.js --network mumbai_testnet
scripts.update:dev:mumbai: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/upgrade.mumbai.js --network mumbai_testnet
